snippet: The smuggling of firearms by a Delta baggage handler should shock anyone who has spent time in an airport security line.
abstract: Editorial calls for airport workers to be required to pass through metal detectors on way to job; points to disclosure that gun-running baggage handler in Georgia was able to smuggle 153 firearms in accomplice's carry-on bag on 17 Delta flights from Atlanta to New York during seven-month period; criticizes fact that passengers, pilots and flight crews must be screened, but workers are not.
lead_paragraph: The smuggling of firearms by a Delta baggage handler should shock anyone who has spent time in an airport security line.
